headline: ScaleReady Announces a G-Rex® Grant has been awarded to Sonoma Biotherapeutics
summary: ScaleReady, in collaboration with Wilson Wolf Manufacturing, Bio-Techne Corporation and CellReady, today announced that Sonoma Biotherapeutics has been awarded a $300,000 G-Rex® Grant. SonomaBio's G-Rex® Grant will enable expeditious development of a G-Rex® based manufacturing process to produce gene-modified regulatory T cell (Treg) therapies for clinical investigation of SonomaBio products in development for various autoimmune related disorders.
